alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Cortland; Madison; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 1:59AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Broome, southeastern Madison, southeastern Cortland, northeastern Tioga and Chenango Counties through 245 AM EST... At 159 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taylor to Willet to Nanticoke. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Norwich, Hamilton, Guilford, Brookfield, Plymouth, North Norwich, Nanticoke, Coventry, Greene and Oxford. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 7 and 8. Interstate 88 near 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
